General.Name: Topco Technologies
General.Description: Topco Technologies Corp. engages in the distribution of silicone products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers silicone oil, foaming and release agent, fiber treatment, paint additives, resin, coupling agent, rubber, PSA, powder, and grease, as well as paper release agent, RTV I, RTV II, sealant, MS-RTV, thermal pad, and LED application material. The company also provides various adhesives, such as EXELAST; surface treatment equipment; matsumoto microsphere; poreflon membrane; privacy filter; touch panel related materials; polymer conductive ink; and conductive thermal material. In addition, it offers LIMS; antistatic agent; estone products; acrylic and water-based adhesives; defoamer; foaming agent; cosmetic raw material; and other products. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
